author: jukka
msg: Use soft references instead of weak ones in ItemStateReferenceCache to keep the references around for as long as there is available memory.

author: jukka
msg: Remove wrapper classes that add no extra functionality to the underlying map implementations.
This simplifies the code and helps identify opportunities for improved data structures.
Also removed an obsolete NodeTypeRegistry reference from SessionItemStateManager.

author: brett
msg: [MRELEASE-318] fix regression that caused NPE when the project.artifacts were null
